GreetingBlock.title: Welcome to the Impex Corp car showroom
GreetingBlock.text: Impex Corp is an auto company that offers its customers a wide range of products and services related to the automotive industry. Having become a leading player in the market, Impex Corp has several key advantages that make them an ideal choice for buyers

firstBlock.title1: Security, Reliability, and Style in every detail!

AboutUs.service_left: The Impex Corp company provides services for the purchase and import of cars from Korea and China!
specialize_right: Impex corp is a company specializing in the sale of high-quality cars

We offer a wide selection of new and used cars of various makes and models to satisfy the needs of the most demanding customers. Offers convenient purchasing conditions, including car financing and exchange programs.
We do everything possible to make the process of purchasing a car as simple and convenient as possible for our customers.

aboutCard.title: What are we doing
texts: We sell quality cars from China and Korea
We offer good experts and professionals
We offer good advice and service

AboutUsBottom.title: You'll get :

info.text2: guarantee of your confidence in the transaction when purchasing a car or ordering from

receive.text: In less than a year, our company has completed over 100 contracts with more than 7 countries and 30 cities of the CIS.

choice.text: SELECTION One of the important tasks for our company is the selection and delivery of special machinery, equipment, raw materials for the mining, light and agricultural industries. We also supply spare parts, accessories and chemicals for cars.
choice.bottom: The company “IMPEX CORP” is also developing in the direction of import-export of food products and tourism. The main activity of our company is the import-export of cars from countries such as China, Korea, Japan, UAE, Georgia, Europe, USA.
